snippet: With a deadlocked Congress, President Obama risks leaving office in 2017 without a major accomplishment from his second term.
abstract: Pres Obama, during fund-raising trip, talks of carbon emissions and introduces series of carbon-reducing steps the federal government will take; acknowledges moves, while substantial, will not have the reach of the global warming bill he wants, but will never get, from this Congress; it is a sign of Obama’s frustrations near the midway point of his second term.
lead_paragraph: With a deadlocked Congress, President Obama risks leaving office in 2017 without a major accomplishment from his second term.

headline.main: Obama, Aggravated by Gridlock, Stresses Results in Midterms
headline.print_headline: Obama, Aggravated by Gridlock, Stresses Results in Midterms
